name: Slash Chord 2: Unforeseen Failure
description:
(WARNING: Flashing red lights, loud beeping noises)

The sequel to the prequel to Slash Chord: Jam Version.

The Eerworms have found themselves in a complicated spot! An unforeseen failure in their flying vehicle's engine has lead to them going on freefall!

You must save the others if you want the invasion to be successful!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move, E to interact.

Made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5 in a handful of hours, plus some extra minutes months after.
